name: Sir CaffeineALot
description:
Sir CaffeineALot is a standard hero in a standard fantasy world with the standard fantasy world problems. The only thing not standard is his crippling addiction of caffeine and his sleep deprivation. His condition is so bad he has to drink coffee every 10 seconds or gets knocked out cold.

Controls: WASD (move) + Space (interact)

Features:

  • Interact with objects to buff up and get obstacles out of the way
  • Yellow interactions can be picked up
  • Blue interactions require other interactions
  • Green interactions are permanent and not lost on reset
  • Red interactions are enemies stopping you
  • On every interaction Sir CaffeineALot gains more experience resulting in completing the interaction faster
  • Every 10 seconds the level is reset
  • On every reset Sir CaffeineALot gets more impatient gaining movement speed
  • Drinking coffee resets the timer

Hint: A powerful weapon is surrounded by a lot of water...

The game was developed as an entry for the Ludum Dare 51 Game Jam in October 2022. The theme was "Every 10 seconds".
